Two users reused a prime to generate their RSA keys. Can you recover the secret message? Ciphertext: 305094493949768538005692912019646856319474518871941428321124722793112565295829444794768708921308767890192601688091692487784390893888162308876177876674620

The flag format is flag{...}
n=6696596370826616864776934260203919541567856773888212076030585773346258293664877344127764357298464178453346847459504613120186446036085757735355897391585787, n2=7534937099337769563704429529960258076752980285268370272962324147264086990356522335342476237555836476806677098606468545826709180097373845411627438745080759, e=281077310760669510322385575395347190746609962151144148391212683072313326600122491913338629843249726411695079421145232736234338914068937100802039189629989

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{2zsozlht}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 305094493949768538005692912019646856319474518871941428321124722793112565295829444794768708921308767890192601688091692487784390893888162308876177876674620
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=6696596370826616864776934260203919541567856773888212076030585773346258293664877344127764357298464178453346847459504613120186446036085757735355897391585787, n2=7534937099337769563704429529960258076752980285268370272962324147264086990356522335342476237555836476806677098606468545826709180097373845411627438745080759, e=281077310760669510322385575395347190746609962151144148391212683072313326600122491913338629843249726411695079421145232736234338914068937100802039189629989
extra_info: p=83001854363364677099249836240989377946454881437225371838537113883351431633469, q=80680081453485666947752028447898177472550101266321401186745251804484938064023, q2=90780346501072111839626461036820130597831751029516566465025346472623903025411, φ(n)=6696596370826616864776934260203919541567856773888212076030585773346258293664713662191947506954417176588657959904085608137482899263060475369668061021888296, φ(n2)=7534937099337769563704429529960258076752980285268370272962324147264086990356348553141611800766897600509399289097924259194242438159070282951271463410421880
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
